title: Denver HIV Risk Score
desc: The Denver HIV Risk Score predicts probability of undiagnosed HIV infection.

orgreference.text: Haukoos JS, Lyons MS, Lindsell CJ, et al. Derivation and validation of the Denver Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV) risk score for targeted HIV screening. Am J Epidemiol. 2012;175(8):838-46.

*Choose practice that yields the highest score, e.g. if patient engages in both vaginal and receptive anal intercourse, choose the latter to assign 8 points.

**Race may/may not provide better estimates of HIV prevalence; optional. See here for more on our approach to addressing race and bias on MDCalc.
